data.text: @JeremyRedfernFL Both are elective. The difference is Norway states vaccines are beneficial while the messaging out of Florida is they’re not beneficial and might be harming. That’s the problem we have with this.
@FLmommin You have no idea what you’re talking about.

@MichaelFromIL @JeremyRedfernFL No, it's just silence because there's nothing he can do about it.

Believe it not, bitching about stuff doesn't change anything if the powers that be don't want it changed - especially when there is no judiciary route to change it.
@OrneryLLama @JeremyRedfernFL Silence on much needed Medicaid expansion is complicity.

@JeremyRedfernFL @ChristinaPushaw Funny, Cheesy Charlie Cringe loves vacs and mask mandates, but when the state makes a simple recommendation, no mandate or directive attached, he goes ballistic. He prefers mandates, not recommendations. Ones he agrees with, of course
@JeremyRedfernFL Honestly I don’t think anyone outside of the media would notice Charlie’s tweets if you and @ChristinaPushaw stopped highlighting his stupidity.

@MichaelFromIL @JeremyRedfernFL Yes, Jeremy Redfern makes the call on not expanding medicaid. you solved it.

Also, we pay for Norways defense. I'd happily stop - so they can cover their own and then work out social service cost afterwards.
@JeremyRedfernFL Why do these people act like the government is stopping them from getting it for their kid if they want? Do they think we need government blessing to live our life?
@JeremyRedfernFL @ChristinaPushaw Charlie doesn’t care. His audience are people who will believe any ridiculous thing he says even if you provide evidence to the contrary…
